name: Fresh Lima Bean and Romaine Lettuce Slaw With Orecchiette
recipeYield: 6 main course servings or 12 side-dish servings
recipeCategory: easy, quick, pastas, salads and dressings
keywords: lettuce, lima beans, pasta, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 large ripe tomatoes, cut into small dice
2 cups fresh or frozen lima beans
2 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste
4 cups romaine lettuce that has been cut across into thin strips

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss together the tomatoes, chives, olives and olive oil. Set aside. Cook the lima beans in simmering water until tender. Drain and add to the tomato mixture.

Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil. Add the orecchiette and cook until al dente, about 10 minutes. Drain. Toss the warm pasta into the salad. Add the salt and pepper to taste. Toss in the lettuce and serve immediately.
